name: A fully opensource flow for SCL180 PDKs
postCreateCommand: set -eux; git lfs install; git lfs pull; test -f /workspaces/vsd-scl180-orfs/orfs/tools/openroad/bin/openroad; if head -n 1 /workspaces/vsd-scl180-orfs/orfs/tools/openroad/bin/openroad | grep -q 'git-lfs'; then echo 'ERROR: openroad is still a Git LFS pointer (LFS not fetched).'; exit 1; fi; sudo install -m 0755 /workspaces/vsd-scl180-orfs/orfs/tools/openroad/bin/openroad /usr/local/bin/openroad; /usr/local/bin/openroad -version || /usr/local/bin/openroad -v || true
